scripts.inst1: npm install && echo cd_client  && cd client && echo install_client  && npm install && cd .. && echo cd_server && cd server  && echo install_server && npm instal && echo cd_home && cd ..
scripts.inst2: npm install && npm install --prefix ./client && npm install --prefix ./server
scripts.prodbuild: cd client && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.prodstart: concurrently --kill-others "npm run backend" " npm run frontend"
